title: Holding Me Together: Essays and Poems
description: Duane Simolke wrote this collection from 1983 to 1999. It begins with the long essay "Reactions to Homophobia," followed by poems and short essays on a variety of topics, such as religion, violence, friendship, and gay relationships. Simolke's writings have appeared in dozens of publications, including The International Journal On World Peace, Midwest Poetry Review, Perception, Caprock Sun, Community Voice, The New Voice of Nebraska, The Amarillo Bridge , and (on the Internet) The Electronic Gay Community Magazine .
author: Duane Simolke
